title: Director's cut
creator_credit: Stephanie Moore and ACMI Digital Storytelling
brief_description: Stephanie reflects on her time as director of Positive Women, a support and advocacy organisation for women with HIV. She is inspired by the courage of the women who must come to terms with a disease that can kill them or significantly reduce their quality of life.
